root.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Spirit Detective
root.description: Gameplay The game features a simple beat-em-up fighting system with light RPG elements. As you progress through the game you level up and increase your stats and learn new abilities. You have control of 4 different characters each with their own unique abilities and weapons such as Yusuke's spirit gun or Kuwabara's spirit sword.
